name: MagiSpire
description:
MagiSpire is a two player asymmetric couch co-op platformer where one player tries to ascend a tower that is constantly being rigged with traps and spells generated by the opposing player.

This game is currently in development as a senior capstone project at the University of California, Santa Cruz. We are a team of 9 students - 4 programmers, 4 artists, and 1 sound designer. 

This is a downloadable demo as of our First Playable Release. There are bugs, and the design is changing all the time. Check back later to see our progress, or follow us on Twitter/Instagram @magispiregame for updates.

If you'd like to give us feedback, you can fill out a Bug Report or Gameplay Feedback Form, or leave a comment. We can also be reached at dev@magispiregame.com We'd love to hear from you, and take all feedback into account during our design meetings!

KEYBOARD / MOUSE CONTROLS:

ESC to pause and to transition from tutorial.

Bottom Player - A, D to move, SPACE to jump, and CTRL to crouch.

Top Player - Mouse click to select and place traps / spells, ENTER to rotate the tower.
